snippet: Joe Girardi found out on Saturday that his father, Jerry, died of Alzheimer’s disease, but the Yankees’ manager did not share the news with his team until Thursday.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Baseball column reveals that New York Yankees manager Joe Girardi did not immediately share the news of his father's death with the team; says that Girardi wanted the team to focus on their playoff series against the Baltimore Orioles.
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi found out on Saturday that his father, Jerry, died of Alzheimer’s disease, but the Yankees’ manager did not share the news with his team until Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Grieving, Girardi Vows To Finish Job
headline.seo: Girardi Honors His Father by Finishing the Job
headline.main: Grieving, Girardi Vows to Finish Job
